text: Joy Ride is the seventh studio album from American R&B; group The Dramatics, released in 1976 via ABC Records. The album peaked at #103 on the Billboard 200 and at #11 on the Billboard R&B; chart. Three singles were released from the album: "Finger Fever", "Be My Girl" and "I Can't Get over You". "Be My Girl" was the most successful single from the album, peaking at #53 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Track listing== ==Chart positions== {|Class = "wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1997) !Peak position |- |US Billboard 200 |align=center|103 |- |US R&B; Albums (Billboard) |align=center|11 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1976 albums Category:ABC Records albums Category:The Dramatics albums Category:albums produced by Don Davis (record producer)
title: Joy Ride (album)
